languages.text: "Ха! Поглядел бы, как туши космический ладей, сгорая в атмосфере, рушатся прямо на головы ничтожным еретикам!"
"Ha, how I would enjoy seeing the carcasses of the spacecraft burn in the atmosphere and come crashing down on the heads of these miserable heretics!"
languages.original_text: "Ха! Поглядел бы, как туши космический ладей, сгорая в атмосфере, рушатся прямо на головы ничтожным еретикам!"

traits.locale_text: "Ha, I would like to see the carcasses of the spacecraft burn in the atmosphere and come crashing down on the heads of the miserable heretics!"
"Ha, I would like to see the carcasses of the spacecraft burn in the atmosphere and come crashing down on the heads of the miserable heretics!"
"Ha, how I would enjoy seeing the carcasses of the spacecraft burn in the atmosphere and come crashing down on the heads of these miserable heretics!"
"Ha, how I would enjoy seeing the carcasses of the spacecraft burn in the atmosphere and come crashing down on the heads of these miserable heretics!"
"Ha, how I would enjoy seeing the carcasses of the spacecraft burn in the atmosphere and come crashing down on the heads of these miserable heretics!"
"Ha, how I would enjoy seeing the carcasses of the spacecraft burn in the atmosphere and come crashing down on the heads of these miserable heretics!"

languages.text: “哈，我会很高兴地看到飞船残骸在穿越大气层时熊熊燃烧，然后狠狠砸在那些该死的异端分子头上！”
languages.original_text: "Ha, how I would enjoy seeing the carcasses of the spacecraft burn in the atmosphere and come crashing down on the heads of these miserable heretics!"

traits.locale_text: “哈，我会很高兴地看到飞船残骸在穿越大气层时熊熊燃烧，然后狠狠砸在那些该死的异端分子头上！”

languages.text: «¡Ja, cómo disfrutaría viendo los trozos de las naves arder en la atmósfera y caer sobre las cabezas de estos miserables herejes!».
languages.original_text: "Ha, how I would enjoy seeing the carcasses of the spacecraft burn in the atmosphere and come crashing down on the heads of these miserable heretics!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Ja, cómo disfrutaría viendo los trozos de las naves arder en la atmósfera y caer sobre las cabezas de estos miserables herejes!».

languages.text: 「はははっ、宇宙船の残骸が大気圏で燃えて、これらの惨めな異端者たちの頭上に墜ちてくるが楽しみで仕方ない！」
languages.original_text: "Ha, how I would enjoy seeing the carcasses of the spacecraft burn in the atmosphere and come crashing down on the heads of these miserable heretics!"

traits.locale_text: 「はははっ、宇宙船の残骸が大気圏で燃えて、これらの惨めな異端者たちの頭上に墜ちてくるが楽しみで仕方ない！」

languages.text: « Ha ! Ce que je donnerais pas pour voir ces vieilles épaves tomber du ciel et s'écraser sur ces maudits hérétiques ! »
languages.original_text: "Ha, how I would enjoy seeing the carcasses of the spacecraft burn in the atmosphere and come crashing down on the heads of these miserable heretics!"

traits.locale_text: « Ha ! Ce que je donnerais pas pour voir ces vieilles épaves tomber du ciel et s'écraser sur ces maudits hérétiques ! »

languages.text: "Ach, was wäre es wunderbar, wenn die Kadaver des Raumschiffs in der Atmosphäre verglühen und diesen erbärmlichen Ketzern auf den Kopf fallen!"
languages.original_text: "Ha, how I would enjoy seeing the carcasses of the spacecraft burn in the atmosphere and come crashing down on the heads of these miserable heretics!"

traits.locale_text: "Ach, was wäre es wunderbar, wenn die Kadaver des Raumschiffs in der Atmosphäre verglühen und diesen erbärmlichen Ketzern auf den Kopf fallen!"

languages.text: "Atmosferde yanan uzay araçlarının gövdelerini ve o acınası kâfirlerin tepelerine çöktüklerini görmek, nasıl da hoşuma gider!"
languages.original_text: "Ha, how I would enjoy seeing the carcasses of the spacecraft burn in the atmosphere and come crashing down on the heads of these miserable heretics!"
